programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Duck Commander sponsors a NASCAR race, Jase and the guys get themselves in the mood by attempting to work as a pit crew.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. The guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break and drive to Mississippi for fried green tomato sandwiches.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but Jep becomes locked inside the box. Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival, Phillip McMillan, challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defence class and use John Luke as a punching bag.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a competition to spend quality time together. John Luke and Mary Kate pack up for college, only to be interrupted by Si and Miss Kay.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of the show. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a 'colour run' to bring awareness to wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty

programme.title: Duck Dynasty

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie asks a local chainsaw artist to make him a statue, he gets a big surprise when it's revealed that the statue is of an unlikely subject, Willie himself.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty

programme.title: Duck Dynasty

programme.title: Duck Dynasty

programme.desc: The 1960s battle between Ford and Ferrari that culminated in the 1966 24 Hours of Le Mans is recapped.

programme.desc: The Bugatti Type 57G Tank, and the Prototype Shelby Cobra Daytona Coupe, both legendary and priceless cars, have more than speed records and world championships in common: they were both locked away under bizarre circumstances, and nearly forgotten.

programme.desc: Chris wants the 1950 F1 Truck he remembers from high school, and Dean wants the 1968 Lincoln Continental he drove with his dad.

programme.desc: A new client longs for her high school glory days and tasks Classic Car Studio with restoring her 1965 Cadillac El Dorado to its original 60's style while adding much needed modern technology.

programme.title: Two Guys Garage
programme.desc: The strip-to-street 1969 Camaro is back in the shop. This time, they install a brand-new EFI system, and replace the old two-speed transmission with a four-speed. All that's left is a new shifter, and they'll be back on the road.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: The guys bring in the fastest diesel truck in the world.

programme.title: Motorweek
programme.desc: The 2020 Porsche 718 Cayman GT4 and the Lexus LC500 Convertible are driven.

programme.desc: Rob heads down to Key West and meets up with a couple of buddies to rekindle old friendships. The bounty of off shore shrimp boats, towers and wrecks abound as they joke around and get into some serious action.

programme.title: Fishing With Roland Martin
programme.desc: Pro bass angler Roland Martin shares expert advice and fishing adventures across America.

programme.title: Facts of Fishing
programme.desc: Get ready to laugh, learn and catch more fish with Dave Mercer.

programme.title: Fishing University
programme.desc: Charlie and Ray welcome guests, Justin Amick and Kendall Burns, owners of Cedar Creek Beef Jerky, as they try their luck on Nolin Lake out of Elizabethtown, Kentucky.

programme.title: Hank Parker's Outdoor Magazine
programme.desc: Entertaining and educational outdoor magazine series.

programme.title: Lindner's Fishing Edge
programme.desc: Jeremy Smith and Ty Sjodin travel to South Dakota's prairie lakes to fish largemouths, smallmouths and white bass.

programme.title: Lake Commandos
programme.desc: Join Steve Pennaz and a guest as they break down new water and try to out-fish each other.

programme.title: Hook n' Look
programme.desc: Kim and guest angler Kevin Vida demonstrate the Strike King's 'Tour Grade Football Jigs and Ragetail Trailers.' Late summer largemouth bass are featured.

programme.title: The Scott Martin Challenge
programme.desc: Scott and Dustin are in Alabama fishing spotted bass.

programme.title: Force on Force
programme.desc: A tenth anniversary special with looks at previous seasons.

programme.title: Cabela's Collegiate Bass Fishing
programme.desc: Get an inside view of the Collegiate Bass Fishing Championship Series with 140 teams.

programme.title: Ultimate Match Fishing
programme.desc: UMF newcomer Jacob Powroznik squares off against 2012 runner-up JT Kenney from Lake Chickamauga.

programme.title: Major League Fishing Cups
programme.desc: Ten anglers compete on Bull Shoals Lake to advance in the Lucas Oil Challenge Cup presented by B&W Trailer Hitches.

programme.title: Major League Fishing: All Angles
programme.desc: Learn how the pros played the game on Day 1 of the 2021 Challenge Cup. Featuring exclusive interviews and behind the scenes content. From Neenah, Wisconsin.

programme.title: Catching Bass With Dustin Wilks
programme.desc: Dustin fishes with Guy Eaker, legendary angler.

programme.title: 2020 Phoenix Bass Fishing League All-American
programme.desc: One of the oldest and most prestigious bass fishing tournaments in the country. This championship has launched the careers of anglers like Jacob Wheeler and Jeremy Lawyer while also celebrating the weekend anglers who love the sport.

programme.desc: Stop #2 of The 2020 Tackle Warehouse Pro Circuit on the Harris Chain of Lakes.
